rooms.description: Wide entrance hall with traditional Kerala tiled flooring and intricate wooden carvings.
Lively living room with a central seating area designed for family gatherings, incorporating natural lighting.
Traditional Kerala-style kitchen with modern amenities integrated into a classic layout.
Cozy dining area adjoining the living room for family meals.
Master bedroom with ample space, built-in wardrobe and large windows aligned with Vastu principles to enhance positivity.
Second bedroom designed for guest use or children, ensuring privacy and comfort.
Well-lit bathroom with natural ventilation and traditional Kerala architectural detailing.
Quiet library space designed for reading and study, incorporating traditional wood elements and ample storage.

openings.details: Large wooden door with ornamental carvings reflecting Kerala tradition.
Highly positioned windows for natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Secure exit door designed to allow smooth movement between levels.
